description:
Corrected tempo for the intro (it IS at 95; I'll leave the rest of the song at 90).

Also, uploading this version mainly because Jader13's version squishes the drum track down to 2 lines and renames it Drumkit, yet retained all the corrections from the previous version. Is that from uploading a GP6 file? Anyways, I've corrected those two things.
title: Sad But True
